description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. 20 lines per page. Written in shikastah nastaʻlīq in black ink. Light cream glazed paper. Marginal notes. On fol. 1a: Table of contents (partly illegible; mentions a treatise by al-Suhrawardī). Seal on fol. 1b. Some leaves have been mended (see fol. 1). Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. Vertical label on the spine (half wanting; number "68" in Arabic numerals). Water damaged. Text 2 was copied in Ramaḍān 1063 or 64 (fol. 44b). Text 3 was copied on 3 Shaʻbān 1065 (fol. 91b). Collation: Paper, fol. 91 ; 1-4⁸ 5⁴ 6-11⁸ 12⁸ (-1, after fol. 91) ; catchword on the verso of each leaf.
author: Jīlānī, Shamsā, active 17th century
abstract: Collection of three treatises on metaphysical questions.
contents: 1. fol. 1b-34b: Fawāʼid qudsīyah wa-asrār malakūtīyah [or: Risālat al-qidam wa-al-ḥudūth] / Mullā Shamsā Jīlānī.
2. fol. 37b-44b: [Risālah fī ʻilm Allāh] / Mullā Shamsā Jīlānī.
3. fol. 45b-91b: Risālah fī ithbāt ḥudūth al-ʻālam / Mullā Shamsā Jīlānī.
4. fol. 45b-50b (on the margins): Mukhtaṣar dar taʻrīf aṣṭurlāb, in 20 bāb.
extent: 91 leaves : paper ; 240 x 135 (162 x 80) mm. bound to 240 x 140 mm.
creator: Jīlānī, Shamsā, active 17th century
جيلاني، شمسا
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
